name: Extract file extension OPTIMIZED
description: Extract any file extension from complex URLs like:http://db-in.com/apis/externals/index.php?url=http://api.twitter.com/1/statuses/followers.xml?user_id=54749221http://domain/api/test.aspx?image1=asf.jpg&image2=asd.jpg&video=veida.flvAnd for simples URLs too:_IMG/384/pbcweb.flvhttp://api.twitter.com/1/users/show.xml#dineybomfim
author: Diney Bomfim
